English.Char_Desc_2000: War Games Inc, a 3D interactive arcade game, play single player or networked. Enjoy flying airplanes, driving tanks, firing artillery and parachuting behind enemy lines. Build your own worlds and scenarios using the World Builder. Play 16 player networked over TCP/IP, play and test your own scenarios and challenge your combat skills. Set up friendly and enemy AI.
